Notes.Text:
This update for nodejs10 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-23920: Fixed insecure loading of ICU data through ICU_DATA environment (bsc#1208487).

Vulnerabilities.Description: An untrusted search path vulnerability exists in Node.js. <19.6.1, <18.14.1, <16.19.1, and <14.21.3 that could allow an attacker to search and potentially load ICU data when running with elevated privileges.
